title: Worldphoneize!
shortDescription: Show every visitor a local phone number.
longDescription:
##Boost engagement and conversions on your site by automatically showing each visitor a phone number that is local to them - so they feel at home.##
Our incredibly easy-to-use app will automatically determine where visitors are located, attempt to match their location to one of your existing local phone numbers, and then replace placeholder text you specify which appears anywhere on your site with the relevant local phone number - so your visitors will feel at home, boosting your conversion rates and driving sales.

##What does it do for visitors to my site?##
- Every visitor to your online shop sees a phone number that's local to them
- This means they feel at home - and so they're more likely to buy from you

##What does it do for me?##
- It helps you convert - because when visitors feel at home, they'll buy more
- It does geolocation automatically and takes only a couple of clicks to set up

##How easy is it to use?##
- We think it's incredibly easy to use; you'll be done in just a couple of clicks
- Adding local number capabilities require no changes to your site or CMS
- You don't even need to change your existing content and there's no coding

##Do I have to pay?##
- The free tier geolocates visitors to show a local number in up to 2 countries
- It will cost nothing regardless of your site's size, turnover, or pageviews
- For more countries, or to customize how numbers appear, upgrade to Pro
instructions: Tip: When previewing the app during installation, Cloudflare pretends you are a visitor in the "USA - Virginia" location. Once the app is installed on your site, visitors from each country will see whichever local number you choose.
author: Xeio Ltd

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Add up to 2 local numbers
products.longDescription: With our Free tier, you can add local numbers for up to two locations and customization options are limited.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Add unlimited local numbers and customize appearance
products.longDescription: With our Pro tier, you can add unlimited local numbers and customize exactly how they appear on your site.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

defaultchoice.description: Choose what happens if a visitor comes from a country where you don't have a local number.

enumNames.0: Do nothing and leave placeholder text as-is
enumNames.2: Hide placeholder text and show nothing

defaultchoice.title: Default choice

divider0a.helpvalue: Tip: To have more than two local numbers, upgrade to Pro

formatting.description: Choose how you want the local number to be displayed.

enumNames.0: Just the local number
enumNames.2: Country name then local number
enumNames.3: Country flag emoji then local number

formatting.title: Formatting

localnumbersfree.description: Add and alter local numbers you want to show visitors from each country you specify.

enumNames.GB: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
enumNames.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
enumNames.SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

localnumbersfree.title: Local numbers

localnumberspro.description: Add and alter local numbers you want to show visitors from each country you specify.

enumNames.GB: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
enumNames.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
enumNames.SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

localnumberspro.title: Local numbers

mainnumber.description: The main phone number your business can be reached on, including international code (eg +1 ...)
mainnumber.title: Main phone number

placeholders.description: The text you want to replace on your website with a phone number that's local to your visitor. This can be any text you specify, but make it distinctive as we will automatically replace every single mention across your site.
placeholders.title: Placeholders

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Add up to 2 local numbers
products.longDescription: With our Free tier, you can add local numbers for up to two countries and customization options are limited.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Add unlimited local numbers and customize appearance
products.longDescription: With our Pro tier, you can add unlimited local numbers and customize exactly how they appear on your site.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Add up to 2 local numbers
products.longDescription: With our Free tier, you can add local numbers for up to two locations and customization options are limited.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Add unlimited local numbers and customize appearance
products.longDescription: With our Pro tier, you can add unlimited local numbers and customize exactly how they appear on your site.

versions.releaseNotes: Added Pro tier and Social & Communication category

proposedApp.title: Localnumberize!
proposedApp.shortDescription: Show every visitor a local phone number.
proposedApp.longDescription:
##Boost engagement and conversions on your site by automatically showing each visitor a phone number that is local to them - so they feel at home.##
Our incredibly easy-to-use app will automatically determine where visitors are located, attempt to match their location to one of your existing local phone numbers, and then replace placeholder text you specify which appears anywhere on your site with the relevant local phone number - so your visitors will feel at home, boosting your conversion rates and driving sales.

##What does it do for visitors to my site?##
- Every visitor to your online shop sees a phone number that's local to them
- This means they feel at home - and so they're more likely to buy from you

##What does it do for me?##
- It helps you convert - because when visitors feel at home, they'll buy more
- It does geolocation automatically and takes only a couple of clicks to set up

##How easy is it to use?##
- We think it's incredibly easy to use; you'll be done in just a couple of clicks
- Adding local number capabilities require no changes to your site or CMS
- You don't even need to change your existing content and there's no coding

##Do I have to pay?##
- The free tier geolocates visitors to show a local number in up to 2 countries
- It will cost nothing regardless of your site's size, turnover, or pageviews
- For more countries, or to customize how numbers appear, upgrade to Pro
proposedApp.instructions: Tip: When previewing the app during installation, Cloudflare pretends you are a visitor in the "USA - Virginia" location. Once the app is installed on your site, visitors from each country will see whichever local number you choose.
proposedApp.author: Xeio Ltd

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Add up to 2 local numbers
products.longDescription: With our Free tier, you can add local numbers for up to two locations and customization options are limited.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Add unlimited local numbers and customize appearance
products.longDescription: With our Pro tier, you can add unlimited local numbers and customize exactly how they appear on your site.

products.shortDescription: Add up to 2 local numbers
products.longDescription: With our Free tier, you can add local numbers for up to two locations and customization options are limited.

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Add unlimited local numbers and customize appearance
products.longDescription: With our Pro tier, you can add unlimited local numbers and customize exactly how they appear on your site.

proposedApp.title: Worldphoneize!
proposedApp.shortDescription: Show every visitor a local phone number.
proposedApp.longDescription:
##Boost engagement and conversions on your site by automatically showing each visitor a phone number that is local to them - so they feel at home.##
Our incredibly easy-to-use app will automatically determine where visitors are located, attempt to match their location to one of your existing local phone numbers, and then replace placeholder text you specify which appears anywhere on your site with the relevant local phone number - so your visitors will feel at home, boosting your conversion rates and driving sales.

##What does it do for visitors to my site?##
- Every visitor to your online shop sees a phone number that's local to them
- This means they feel at home - and so they're more likely to buy from you

##What does it do for me?##
- It helps you convert - because when visitors feel at home, they'll buy more
- It does geolocation automatically and takes only a couple of clicks to set up

##How easy is it to use?##
- We think it's incredibly easy to use; you'll be done in just a couple of clicks
- Adding local number capabilities require no changes to your site or CMS
- You don't even need to change your existing content and there's no coding

##Do I have to pay?##
- The free tier geolocates visitors to show a local number in up to 2 countries
- It will cost nothing regardless of your site's size, turnover, or pageviews
- For more countries, or to customize how numbers appear, upgrade to Pro
proposedApp.instructions: Tip: When previewing the app during installation, Cloudflare pretends you are a visitor in the "USA - Virginia" location. Once the app is installed on your site, visitors from each country will see whichever local number you choose.
proposedApp.author: Xeio Ltd

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Add up to 2 local numbers
products.longDescription: With our Free tier, you can add local numbers for up to two locations and customization options are limited.

products.longDescription: With our Pro tier, you can add unlimited local numbers and customize exactly how they appear on your site.

defaultchoice.description: Choose what happens if a visitor comes from a location where you don't have a local number.

enumNames.0: Do nothing and leave magic snippet text as-is
enumNames.2: Hide magic snippet text and show nothing

defaultchoice.title: Default choice

divider0a.helpvalue: Tip: To have more than two local numbers, upgrade to Pro

formatting.description: Choose how you want the local number to be displayed.

enumNames.0: Just the local number
enumNames.2: Country name then local number
enumNames.3: Country flag emoji then local number

formatting.title: Formatting

localnumbersfree.description: Add and alter local numbers you want to show visitors from each location you specify. These can be the same as your main phone number, or different for each local office or forwarding number.

enumNames.GB: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
enumNames.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
enumNames.SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

localnumbersfree.title: Local numbers

localnumberspro.description: Add and alter local numbers you want to show visitors from each location you specify. These can be the same as your main phone number, or different for each local office or forwarding number.

enumNames.GB: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
enumNames.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
enumNames.SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

localnumberspro.title: Local numbers

mainnumber.description: The main phone number your business can be reached on, including international code (eg +1 ...)
mainnumber.title: Main phone number

placeholders.description: Magic snippets are short bits of text you want us to replace on your website with a phone number that's local to the visitor. This can be any text you specify, but make it distinctive as we will automatically replace every single mention across your site.
placeholders.title: Magic snippets
